name: SelenaTalkDuessel
_source: speak;Selena;General Duessel...|I must offer you my apologies.|I called you a traitor, but I was mistaken.|Your loyalty never wavered, not for an instant.
speak;Selena;And yet you must know that I have no intention of withdrawing.|So let us not waste words.|Let us settle this with steel, my friend.
speak;Duessel;That's how it is to be, then?|One of us dies by the other's hands?
speak;Selena;Yes. It's the path I've chosen.|I have no regrets.
speak;Duessel;I see...|Well.|I, too, must follow the path that I have chosen.
